description: This file defines an Angular standalone component named StatusFormComponent used to create or edit status entries within the application. It manages a form with title, state, and description fields, and emits events upon submission or cancellation.

classes.name: StatusFormComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for rendering and managing a status form, including input binding for initial data, output events for save and cancel actions, and form validation.

methods.name: ngOnChanges
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that updates the form with initial data when input properties change.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles the form submission event; emits the form data if valid.
